All Implemented Interfaces:
HasHandlers, EventListener, HasAlignment, HasHorizontalAlignment, HasVerticalAlignment, HasWidgets, IndexedPanel, InsertPanel, Iterable<Widget>
public class LimitedTextArea
extends VerticalPanel

A text area with a character limit that displays the limit to the user.

getText

public String getText()

getTextArea

public TextArea getTextArea()
Returns the text area being limited. Don't call TextBoxBase.setText(java.lang.String) directly on this area. Use setText(java.lang.String).
